title: Deactivate Expired Coupon Codes
description: An automated job runs daily to find and deactivate any coupon codes that have passed their expiration date.

tasks.description: Query the system for all active coupon codes whose expiration date is in the past.
tasks.expected_outcome: System generates a list of expired codes.

tasks.description: For each expired code, change its status to 'Inactive'.
tasks.expected_outcome: System successfully deactivates all the identified coupon codes.
